name: Kissing Foes
description:
OVERVIEW

The town of Frownville has been hit by a terrible curse!
Everybody has been turned into monsters. It's up to you to turn everyone's frown upside down! Use your special smooch powers to turn everyone back to normal. Give all the foes a big kiss to convert them back to happy villagers!

Includes over a hundred Love Quotes by various people including Bob Marley, Marylin Monroe and Nicolas Sparks!

CONTROLS

  • Arrow keys to move around
  • Enter/Space/Z to smooch
  • Hold "S" to recieve a hint
  • F5 to go fullscreen
  • F6 to change resolution

CONTACT

runoshin@gmail.com

CREDITS

Kiss picture is taken from http://www.wattpad.com/13046777-the-wanted-preferences-7-first-kiss
Love Quotes are taken from https://www.goodreads.com/quotes/tag/love
Window Border "Bloody Mess" used from modder Liberty
Enterberain/Degica for creating RPG Maker VX Ace (rpgmakerweb.com)
